"[ PERMISSION REQUEST ]"

 Thank you for choosing E Libra. Before we proceed, we kindly ask for your storage permission on your device.

 "[ PERMISSION REQUIRED ]"

 "STORAGE:" This permission allows us to store and access files on your device.

 "[ WHY STORAGE PERMISSION IS REQUIRED ]"

 E Libra needs access to your device's storage to fetch PDF files and their thumbnails.Please note that E Libra operates offline, ensuring your privacy and convenience.

 "[ HOW TO GRANT PERMISSION ]"

 To grant permission for storage access, please tap 'Grant Permission' below. If you choose not to grant this permission, the application may not be accessible.

Welcome to the E Libra Application developed by Mr. Deadrim.

 This app aims to revolutionize your reading experience by providing a seamless platform for accessing and managing your favorite books.

 With this application, you can easily add new books, update existing ones, and conveniently save your reading progress to pick up right where you left off.

 The app focuses on optimization to ensure smooth performance and a user-friendly interface, making reading a pleasure on any Android device.

 Dive into the world of literature with the E Libra Application and elevate your reading journey.

 Supported Devices: Android 7.0 to 14

 E Libra Source Code: https://github.com/MRDEADRIM/E-Libra

 Other Projects: https://github.com/MRDEADRIM

 Thank you for using E Libra.
